Docs.related: UI Automation Control Patterns for Clients
Implementing the UI Automation MultipleView Control Pattern

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentView As Integer
public: property int CurrentView { int get(); };

Docs.value: The integer value for the current view of the . The default value is 0.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The collection of view identifiers is identical across instances.
## Examples In the following example, an integer identifier is obtained, representing the current view for a control that supports <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern>.
:::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs" id="Snippet101"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb" id="Snippet101"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs" id="Snippet1035"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb" id="Snippet1035":::

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32[] GetSupportedViews() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves a collection of control-specific view identifiers.
Docs.returns: A collection of integer values that identify the views available for an . The default is an empty integer array.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The collection of view identifiers is identical across instances.
View identifier values can be passed to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.GetViewName%2A>.
## Examples In the following example, a collection of integer identifiers is obtained, representing the views available for a control that supports <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern>.
:::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs" id="Snippet101"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb" id="Snippet101"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.cs" id="Snippet1025"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAMultipleViewPattern_snippets.vb" id="Snippet1025":::
